room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: We just completed the Casino Royal room in 57:39! The room had a good story to follow. The room was clean. The puzzles were hard but fair. Lisa was a great host, very attentive & helpful. We had to request a couple of "hints." She did a great job helping without giving anything away. We plan on returning for another room. Lisa suggested the Runaway train next for a more difficult room.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: Although it was difficult to try to get everyone to figure out how to escape, it was a lot of fun! We tried very hard not to use some hints but we eventually needed one. The only problem was that some doors wouldnâ€™t open even when we typed in the right answer. Thankfully our spectator would pause the time for us.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: Casino Royale was great! Challenging and fun! The clues our guy gave definitely helped us. I would go back again.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: just played Operation: Casino and it was awesome! Very well crafted game design; the puzzles are difficult enough to be fairly challenging, but not so tough that you can't figure them out in time, and the moment of clarity when you figure them out is very rewarding as they're complicated enough to make you feel pretty clever when you solve a clue. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
review: Great room, very intriguing and way harder than it looks! Great staff added to the fun!
